title: Ratio of electric flux through spherical surfaces

content.question: The magnitude of the electric flux through A is <math> <mrow> <msub> <mtext>Φ</mtext> <mi>A</mi> </msub> </mrow> </math> The magnitude of the electric flux through surface B is <math> <mrow> <msub> <mtext>Φ</mtext> <mi>B</mi> </msub> </mrow> </math>. The ratio <math> <mrow> <msub> <mtext>Φ</mtext> <mi>A</mi> </msub> <mo>/</mo> <msub> <mtext>Φ</mtext> <mi>B</mi> </msub> </mrow> </math> is
